akn:subsection.akn:heading: Supplemental grant applications pertaining to national training initiatives in critical and emerging needs

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Supplemental grant applications pertaining to national training initiatives in critical and emerging needs To be eligible to receive a supplemental grant under section 15061(b) of this title, a Center may submit a supplemental application to the Secretary at such time, in such manner, and containing such information as the Secretary may require, pursuant to the terms and conditions set by the Secretary consistent with section 15063(b) of this title.
